title: FS:  Scoops Carey, SL, PSA 5, Great Centering
author: GregMitch34

posts.post_title: FS:  Scoops Carey, SL, PSA 5, Great Centering
posts.post_content:
Really terrific EX card for Southern Leaguer Scoops Carey, with great centering and fine  back.  Carey is one of the tougher PSA ones to find above this grade, and centering also stands out here.   $376 plus $3 mailing, pp gift.  Thanks.
